lines.text: You just stabbed me with a corn dog stick!

[about Clay, the new clown]
I swear, you can take that Son of a Bitch's brain, put it on the edge of a rasor blade, and it'd look like a b-b in a four lane highway!
He stabbed me with a damn corndog stick, Brownie!
Virgil, how many lives do you have?
Uno, dos, tres, quatro, cinco... I belive about nine!
Well, I belive you done used up about half of them on that bull, Mother-In-Law.
Yeah, I believe I did use up about half on him; and then the other half I used up on my own mother-in-law!
